job_title: Health Care Aid in Lethbridge, AB
pros: GSS provides flexibility in job access to scheduling.  At the end of the day/night you know you have contributed to the welfare of seniors or disadvantaged people. Staff have a chance to be creative with the residence in creating a homelike environment when given the opportunity of proper staffing.
cons: Burnout is common due to shortage of workers on the floor during periods of high acuity.  Upper and middle management have little concept of nursing as they are often without a health care background which potentially can endanger the safety of both residents and staff.

job_title: Health Care Aide in Lethbridge, AB
pros:
1.  GSS north side Lethbridge provided an atmosphere where the staff could interact with each other and clients in a productive environment.
2. When it was brought to management's attention regarding ratio of lifts vs independent residents, they took steps to make the workload more reasonable
cons:
Communication between management and staff is always an area of opportunity.  
The over night shifts are often not considered when planning mandatory staff meetings as they are scheduled in the middle of the day (2 or 3 PM)  which would the same as asking a day person to show up at 3 AM for mandatory meetings.

review_title: Collapse of a once caring strong valued organization to a fearful, cold and callous organization.
pros: There were some great employees who cared about their jobs- before the mass layoffs.
cons: No job stability -would never recommend a friend or family to work there. Mass layoffs of many long term staff done without respect or dignity.  With new CEO a change of culture with no respect for employees and a new culture of fear for ones job. Only way your job is safe is if you are buddy's with the CEO.
